00038 namespace propt = boost::program_options;
00039 
00040 void CtpRun::Initialize() {
00041 
00042     QMApplication::Initialize();
00043 
00044     AddProgramOptions("Calculators") ("execute,e", propt::value<string>(),
00045                       "List of calculators separated by ',' or ' '");
00046     AddProgramOptions("Calculators") ("list,l",
00047                       "Lists all available calculators");
00048     AddProgramOptions("Calculators") ("description,d", propt::value<string>(),
00049                       "Short description of a calculator");
00050 }
00051 
00052 bool CtpRun::EvaluateOptions() {
00053 
00054     if (OptionsMap().count("list")) {
00055             cout << "Available calculators: \n";
00056             for(Calculatorfactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=
00057                     Calculators().getObjects().begin();
00058                     iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00059                 PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _short );
00060             }
00061             StopExecution();
00062             return true;
00063        //Application::StopExecution();
00064     }
00065  
00066     
00067     if (OptionsMap().count("description")) {
00068             CheckRequired("description", "no calculator is given");
00069             Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["description"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00070             // loop over the names in the description string
00071             for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n) {
00072                 // loop over calculators
00073                 bool printerror = true;
00074                 for(Calculatorfactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin(); 
00075                         iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00076 
00077                     if ( (*n).compare( (iter->first).c_str() ) == 0 ) {
00078                          PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _long );
00079                         printerror = false;
00080                         break;
00081                     }
00082                  }
00083                  if ( printerror ) cout << "Calculator " << *n << " does not exist\n";
00084             }
00085             StopExecution();
00086             return true;     
00087         //cout << "Sorry... Note implemented." << endl;
00088         //Application::StopExecution();
00089     }
00090 
00091     QMApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00092     CheckRequired("execute", "Nothing to do here: Abort.");
00093 
00094     Tokenizer calcs(OptionsMap()["execute"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00095     Tokenizer::iterator it;
00096     for (it = calcs.begin(); it != calcs.end(); it++) {
00097         QMApplication::AddCalculator(Calculators().Create((*it).c_str()));
00098     }
00099     return 1;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void CtpRun::PrintDescription(const char *name, const bool length) {
00103         // loading the documentation xml file from VOTCASHARE
00104         char *votca_share = getenv("VOTCASHARE");
00105         if(votca_share == NULL) throw std::runtime_error("VOTCASHARE not set, cannot open help files.");
00106         string xmlFile = string(getenv("VOTCASHARE")) + string("/ctp/xml/")+name+string(".xml");
00107         try {
00108             Property options;
00109             load_property_from_xml(options, xmlFile);
00110 
00111            if ( length ) { // short description of the calculator
00112                
00113                  cout << string("  ") << _fwstring(string(name),14);
00114                  cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>();
00115 
00116             } else { // long description of the calculator
00117                 cout << " " << _fwstring(string(name),18);
00118                 cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>() << endl;
00119  
00120                 list<Property *> items = options.Select(name+string(".item"));
00121 
00122                 for(list<Property*>::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter!=items.end(); ++iter) {
00123                     //cout << "Long description" << endl;
00124                     Property *pname=&( (*iter)->get( string("name") ) );
00125                     Property *pdesc=&( (*iter)->get( string("description") ) );
00126                     //Property *pdflt=&( (*iter)->get( string("default") ) );
00127                     if ( ! (pname->value()).empty() ) {
00128                         cout << string("  -") << _fwstring(pname->value(), 20);
00129                         cout << pdesc->value() << endl;
00130                     }
00131                  }
00132             }
00133             cout << endl;
00134         } catch(std::exception &error) {
00135             cout << string("XML file or description tag missing: ") << xmlFile;
00136         }
00137 }
